content: Me: Let me take you home
Me: Why don't I carry you on my back?
Shungen: No, no, you're a girl
Me: No, no, no! I'll carry you, I'll carry you, I can definitely move you
Shungen: Hahahaha, thank you for being by my side
The two of them walking side by side against the sunset, occasionally having a little fight, laughter accompanied by the beautiful afterglow, is a common youth and memory for both of them.
